property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent's attack deals damage, your first attack next turn gets +2 damage and +2 speed. R Commit: After your opponent's unblocked attack resolves, play 1 reversal.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Search your deck for 1 copy of Battlefist and attach it to your character. R Commit: After you attack Battlefist to your character, add 1 of either player's assets or foundations to the top of their deck. E (4+): Your attack gets +1 damage for each copy of Battlefist attached to your character.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If your starting character is Runika, you may attach this card to your character when it is added to your staging area. You may play abilities on this card while it is in the attachment zone. E [Your turn] Remove: Ready up to 2 foundations that have not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: When you have more than 10 foundations, destroy this asset. First E Commit: If this is your first attack this turn, its damage and speed cannot be reduced by effects. E Remove: If this atack is not blocked, change its damage to 4. Only playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you have been dealt damage this turn this attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your non-throw attack gets +4 damage and -4 speed. E Remove: This high or low attack gets -4 damage (minimum 4). Only playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Players with more than 10 foundations add 2 ready foundations to the top of their deck. E [Your turn] Discard the top card of your deck: This attack gets a damage bonus to the control of the discarded card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck: If both cards discarded were foundations, you may add the first attack you played this turn from your card pool to your momentum and this attack gets Multiple: 1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your first attack this turn dealt damage, this attack gets +2 damage and +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +1 damage for each of your ready foundations. Only playable if you have 10 or fewer foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you bloack a mid attack with this card, it still deals half damage (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Players with more than 10 foundations must add 1 foundation to the top of their deck. R Commit: After you are dealt damage by an unblocked attack, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you check this card, you may draw 1 card. E Commit: Your order attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First E Remove: If you have 10 or fewer foundations, reduce this attack's damage to 0. Your opponent's next attack this turn gets +X damage. X equals the printed damage of this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Remove, discard 1 momentum: Add 1 asset from your discard pile or attachment zone to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Your attack] Remove, discard 1 momentum: Commit your opponent's character.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack played as a reversal gets +1 damage, +1 speed and Stun: 1. F Destroy: If your opponent has more than 10 foundations, commit 1 of their foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals 1 damage during the Damage Step. F Destroy: Both players add 1 foundation to the top of their deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Each ability on this character is only playable once per turn. E: Your air attack gets +2 speed. E: Your earth attack gets +2 damage. E: Your fire attack gets Stun: 1. E: Your water attack gets +1 to all keyword ratings.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Your foundation cannot be committed by your opponent's effects. R (6+): After your opponent plays a non-attack card, they discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: air E: This attack gets +1 to its multiple rating for each ressource symbole it shares with your character.

property.name: CardText
property.value: earth E: Your next attack with a printed damage of 4 this turn gets Throw. water E: This attack gets +2 speed for each momentum discarded ti play the cost of this attack's Powerfull ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: fire E: This attack gets Stun: 2. water E: If the speed and damage of this attack are both greater than their printed values, draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you check this to play an air card, that check gets +1. First E Commit your character: This attack gets +2 damage, +2 speed, and you may ready 1 foundation that has not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: earth or fire E Commit: If your non-throw attack is completely blocked, it still deals 1 damage for each resource symbol it shares with your character during the Damage Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack has the earth and fire resource symbols, it gets +3 damage and your character gains a resource symbol of your choice for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After a player discards a card due to an effect, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Remove: After an attack is played, it loses all non-keyword abilities.

property.name: CardText
property.value: earth E Commit: Seal 1 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit : If your attack's damage is below printed, it gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets -2 speed. E Discard 1 earth card: This attack gets +1 or -1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play this card, your opponent flips 1 foundation. While this card is in your card pool, both player's characters gain the air and water ressource symbols.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Your turn] Flip: After you play an attack, if your opponent has 3 or more cards in their hand, it gets +3 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play a symbol-specific ability, discard 1 card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Add this card to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Once per turn]: This attack gets +3 damage. No more enhances may be played this Enhance Step. R [Once per turn] Destroy 1 foundation: After your opponent plays a foundation, discard it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 foundation: Change the zone of your attack to any other zone. R [Once per turn]: After your opponent plays a foundation, look at their hand and discard 1 card of your choice from it. Your opponent draws 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If your character is Khadath, while this card is in your staging area, when paying costs you may destroy this asset instead of destroying 1 foundation or discarding 1 momentum. R Commit: After your opponent plays an attack, you may play the first enhance during the Enhance Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 3 momentum: After you play this attack, look at your opponent's hand and discard all non-attack cards from it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Hand] Add this card to your card pool, discard 1 attack: After your opponent plays an attack with 2 or more keywords, add it to their hand and play this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets +3 damage. Your opponent cannot play any more enhance abilities this Enhance Step. E: If you have played a combo ability this Enhance Step, this attack gets +3 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is not blocked, it does not clear from your card pool during the End Phase. R [Card Pool] Remove: After your opponent plays a foundation, discard it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First E: Your opponent reveals 1 card from their hand. If that card does not have a block, this attack gets +4 damage. If it has a block, change the zone of this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Cancel your opponent's next enhance this Enhance Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays a foundation, add the top card of your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays a response ability, commit 1 of their foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: order E Remove: If you have no cards in your hand, both players draw 2 cards. F Destroy: If you are at desperation, gain 3 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy: Before the Block Step, this attack gets +2 or -2 speed. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy: After your opponent's attack resolves, turn it face down. Playable while committed. R Commit: Before the Block Step, this attack gets +2 damage for each Unique foundation in your opponent's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Remove: Both players discard their hands and draw back up to their printed hand size.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this card is removed from your staging area due to your opponent's effect, add the top card of your deck to your staging area face down. E: Your ally or safe attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card does not count toward progressive difficulty. R [Card Pool]: After an attack is played, reveal the top card of your deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Your turn] Commit: Destroy 1 of your opponent's face down foundations. E [Your turn] Commit: Destroy 1 of your opponent's Unique foundations. Only playable if you have fewer foundations than your opponent.

property.value: R Remove: After an attack is played, it gets Flash.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your opponent's next attack this turn loses all keywords and gets +2 damage.

property.value: After you check this card, you may ready 1 foundation that has not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack with a printed damage of 2 gets +3 damage. E Commit: Your attack with a printed damage of 3 gets +2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play this card, remove 1 card in your opponent's discard pile from the game. E COmmit: If the zone of your charge or slam attack attack is mid, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Your turn] Commit: Commit 1 of your opponent's foundations with no enhance abilities on it. If they have more than 1 copy of that card, remove it from the game.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Flip: After a player makes a check, they re-check.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy 1 foundation: After your opponent plays an enhance or response ability during this attack, if you have 10 or fewer foundations, cancel it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Hand] Add this to your card pool: After you opponent plays an attack during your turn, discard it and play this attack(no check necessary).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your high and low attacks get +2 damage for the rest of the turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: The check to block this attack gets -1 for each mid attack in your card pool. E: Your next mid attack this turn gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: You may discard foundations from your card pool in addition to momentum to pay this attack's powerful cost.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your opponent lose 2 vitality for each of their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: The zone of the first multiple copy of this attack is mid. The zone of the second multiple copy of this attack is low.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent has more foundations than you do, both players destroy 2 foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit your character: If your opponent has 8 or more ready foundations, change this attack Stun rating to 5. If your opponent has 10 or more ready foundations, change this attack's Stun rating to 8 instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, when paying costs you may discard this card instead of 1 momentum. E: If your opponent's character is committed, this attack gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R (5+): Before you take damage from an attack, reduce the damage you would take by 1 (minimum 3).

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Remove: Both players search their deck for 1 card and add it to their hand, then discard 1 random card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Card Pool]: After you block with this card, look at your opponent's hand and commit 1 of their foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent's gets a damage or speed bonus, return its damage and speed to their printed values.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 foundation: Your next mid attack this turn gets -1 difficulty and +2 damage. E Commit: Your mid attack gets +1 speed for each attack card in your card pool. The speed of this attack cannot be reduced by effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First E Destroy 1 foundation: This attack gets +1 damage and +1 speed. Choose 1 of your opponent's committed foundations. That foundation does not ready during the next Ready Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Add 1 mid attack from your discard pole to your card pool. R [Once per Enhance Step]: After 1 of your foundations is destroyed, this attack gets +2 or -2 damage.

property.value: E [Your attack] Commit: Flip 1 asset. E Commit: Your World of Indines attack gets Stun: 1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack gets +2 damage and +2 speed for each other copy with the same name in your card pool. Playable by either player. E Destroy 1 foundation: Add 1 attack from your discard pile to your card pool. Playable by either player.

property.name: CardText
property.value: At the start of each Combat Phase, both players may seal 1 of their opponent's foundations. E [Your turn] Commit: Seal 1 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Remove: Flip all assets and foundations with 'Flip' in its cost in both staging areas. R (5+): After your opponent plays a keyword ability, they flip 1 foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Remove, lose 2 vitality: After your opponent plays an ability on their character, cancel its effects. Only playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays an ability that draws or adds any number of cards to their hand, they discard 1 card and you draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this foundation is destroyed during the Enhance Step, your attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: You may play 1 enhance ability on a committed foundation in your opponent's staging area, paying no costs.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this foundation is destroyed, you may add 1 momentum to your staging area face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 1 card: Add 1 mid attack from your card pool to your hand. Your Combat Phase ends.

property.value: After this foundation is destroyed during your attack's Enhance Step it gets +2 damage. E Commit: Your mid attack gets +1 speed for each mid attack in your card pool.

property.value: After this foundation is destroyed during the Enhance Step, your mid attack gets +2 speed. R Commit: After you play a combo ability, this attack gets +2 damage.

property.value: R [Your turn] Commit: After your attack is blocked, choose 1 of your opponent's foundations. It does not ready during their next Ready Step.
